grimoire:
Savorya is the magic of mind and spirit, perhaps the most esoteric of the convocations of the Shek-Pvar.
Savoryans deal with aura and knowledge, with principles which, they at least believe, stand above the other elements, and of the Shek-Pvar. A Savoryan's is, probably, the greatest knowledge of psionics, and perhaps of Kelestia itself.
It is not possible to read a person's deep thoughts with Savorya. The aura of a person - which gives religious, moral and elemental connections - may be read, as can emotions. The latter can give clues to a person's surface thoughts, but spells to delve deeper than this are unknown.
When a person's aura is read, a roll is made (determined by the spell) and the following chart should be used to find what information was revealed.
Reading an aura
Target Detail sensed
10
The bloodline or basic nature of the target is known. Whether someone is Human, Sindarin, Faerie or an elemental or demonoic spirit is known.
20
Elemental and divine affinities, if any. Shek-Pvar who are attuned to an element will have an aura tainted by that element. Priests of a god are also bound to their god, and this affects their aura.
30
The physical and mental well being of the target is known. Roughly how exhausted, injured and hungry the target is can be determined, as well as their primary emotions.
40
Knowledge of a person's morals, in regard to whether they are good (generous, helpful) or evil (selfish, spiteful) is obtained. This reading is probably the most unreliable.
50
If the target has any leanings towards Law (trustworthy, consistent) or Chaos (treacherous, random), then this can be determined.
60
The religion of the target, even if they are not a priest. Also given, is a general guide to how strongly they follow the ideals of their faith.
A person's emotions can be read in the following detail levels. In all cases, all lower details are known as well as the highest attained.
Reading emotions in a target
Target Detail sensed
10
The single strongest, most active, emotion of the target is known. Note that only active emotions are detected, so a religious fanatic who is relaxing and playing cards, will probably show an emotion about the game.
20
The strongest passion of the target is known, regardless of whether it is active or not. The target of the passion is not known (e.g. which religion a fanatic follows, only that the person is fanatical).
30
The target of detected emotions and passions are known. So the religion of a fanatic could be determined.
40
Conflicting emotions related to main emotion are known.
50
All other emotions currently active are known.
60
Visual impressions.
Savorya elementals are spirits, generally appearing as a white, faintly glowing mist. They have minimal affect on the physical world, feeling like a soft breeze at most. They are unable to pass through physical objects.
They may engage in a sort of mental assualt, causing fatigue in the target. In this case, they cause damage with their will, against the will of the target, causing fatigue levels in the same way that a physical attack causes wound or stun levels.
Savorya elmentals can perceive the physical world, regardless of the level of illumination. They see emotions in the same ense that magic (Neutral) elementals see auras. Their emotion sense is d20 + rank * 5. They can also tell, to some extent, the strength of a creature's mind.

Detects the current aura of the target, according to the aura chart. Roll a d20 + 10 * (rank-1) to find the detail of aura detected.
1 day Artifact Artifact +25 Artifact transmits audio as well +50 Image is clear out to 3m +100 Image is clear out to 15m
This spell must be enchanted into two or more artifacts, normally glass or crystal balls, a gem or a mirror. As long as the artifacts remain within range of each other, whatever light falls on one will be displayed on the surface of the others, allowing them to be used as scrying devices (though the image shown is reversed).
The basic spell allows the artifact to display a poor quality, out of focus, image. Anything within a metre or so of the artifact can be seen. A boosted version of the spell allows sound to be transmitted, and also improves the focus of the image, allowing things to be seen clearly out to a greater range.
The artifacts must be within some range of each other in order to be able to transmit. The range of the artifact is equal to 1km at rank I, and increases by a factor of five each rank thereafter (5km, 125km, 625km etc). A rank VII artifact covers the entire world.
The above assumes that two artifacts are being created, in which case both communicate with each other. Communication is continuous, and cannot be switched off, so they are sometimes left covered when not in use. The network can be increased by creating three or more artifacts at the same time. Each artifact beyond the second reduces the effective rank of the spell by one (for purposes of range, dispelling etc).
The seeing eye will only communicate with one other at a time. To switch, the artifact must be touched and the name of the desired destination spoken. The artifacts are named at time of creation.

An enchantment that causes a bout of confusion in the target. The effect of the confusion is to lower all skill rolls by -5 for the duration of the spell.
Self Will Concentration +10 Range touch +20 Bonus is +6 +40 Effects all three senses
An enchantment which increases the perception of the target, giving a +3 bonus to either eyesight, hearing or taste related skill rolls (combat skills are unaffected though). After the spell is ended, the target suffers a penalty equal to the bonus for a period equal to twice the time they were under the effect of the spell.
Self Special +20 One word answers possible +40 Provides answer to a specific keyword
This spell allows the caster to ask a simple yes/no question. The question must be on a subject close to the caster - it cannot involve knowledge that cannot be found nearby. The caster can only use this spell, or one similar to it, once a week. It takes d20*5 minutes before an answer is returned. Higher castings of this spell provides an answer to a specific keyword or subject. This gives less control over the answer, but can help if the caster does not know what question to ask.
Touch Will Concentration +10 Caster is immune to the glamour +20 Can obscure whole sentences/ideas +40 Can add one new idea to the work
An enchantment which can be placed on a written work, or other information-bearing object, to apparently change its meaning. The spell does not affect the object, but it adjusts the reader's understanding. The caster is not immune to the effect. Whenever someone tries to read the work, they get a will roll opposed to the caster's own will. The caster does not have to stay near the work once the spell is cast, but she does have to concentrate on the spell. Glamour can rarely adjust more than ten percent of the intrinsic meaning.
Touch Bravery Momentary +20 Range is reach +40 Range is near
Causes the target creature to suffer a sudden fear of the caster. They must make a bravery check against the caster's will, or flee in panic from the caster. The duration of the effects will generally be until the situation has calmed down. There must be a visible reason for the target to panic, though generally a loud voice is often enough.
Touch Restraint Momentary +20 Range is reach +40 Range is near
A spell which causes the target to become furious at someone or something. A will check is needed, modified by suitable personality traits. There needs to be a reason for the fury - a spilt drink, an imagined insult, or not giving the target what they want.
Touch Ego Concentration +20 Range is near +40 Bonus is +10
Allows the caster to have a better sense of whether the target is telling lies. A +5 bonus is gained to all perception guile checks the caster makes against the target.
Near Ego Concentration +15 Number of targets is 3 +30 Number of targets is 12 +60 Range is short
The target of this spell perceives an illusion, centred on the Shek-Pvar. The caster becomes bathed in light, surrounded by a soft aura. The effect depends very much on the viewer, but may instill fear in those who dislike light, and could give a favourable response from those who follow the gods of light.
Near Ego Concentration +15 Number of targets is 3 +30 Number of targets is 12 +60 Range is short
Creates an illusion in the mind of the spell target, making them perceive dark shadows wrap around the Shek-Pvar. The shadows are designed to draw attention to the caster, rather than to hide her. They may cause fear, or impress the viewer, though the spell does not attempt to affect how the target reacts to the illusion.
Reach Ego Momentary +15 Range near +30 Range short +60 Range medium
Places a thought into the target's mind, not exceeding five words in length. The target is aware that the thought is external in origin.

A spell which increases the will power of the target, giving them a +1 to their will. Once the spell ends, the target suffers a penalty equal to the bonus for a duration equal to twice the time they were under the effect of the spell.
Reach Will x Ego Concentration +15 Range near +30 Affects up to three targets +60 Affects up to twelve targets
If the target fails their ego roll, then they gain one level of long term fatigue. Each round the spell is maintained, another resistence roll is allowed else another point of fatigue is gained. The spell will stop affecting a target as soon as they resist, or if they move out of range.
Reach Ego Concentration +15 Range near +30 Range short +60 Roll die + 30
A spell by which the caster can determine the aural nature of a target. Roll d20 + 20 to determine how much detail is learned. See the aura detail chart for information on what difficulties will give what information.
The target of the spell can be changed each round, if desired, or the ongoing aura of the target can be monitored.
Reach Ego Concentration +15 Range near +30 Range short +60 Roll die + 30
A spell which allows the caster to read the emotions of the target creature. Roll d20 +20 to determine how much detail is learned. See the emotion detail chart for information on what difficulties will give what information.
The target of the spell can be changed each round, if desired, or the ongoing aura of the target can be monitored.
Touch Ego Concentration +15 Range is reach +30 Range is near +60 Passion gained is at +3
Places a painful emotion into the target, which nags and taunts at them while the spell is maintained. It is a fear of something unknown, a fear which cannot be named. The target gains a personality trait of 'fear of everything' at +2. Ego checks at difficulty 20 are required in order for the target to initiate new endeavours.
Eye Concentration Ego +15 Bind target to a grudging agreement +30 Bind target to an unwilling agreement +60 Force agreement
Plants a suggestion in a person's mind to carry out some task. The task must be simple in nature (e.g. deliver a message, kill a person, guard me), and must be verbally described to the target. For the base spell, the target must agree to the task willingly - this spell is useful only for ensuring that they don't go back on their word. A grudging agreement is where the target would normally refuse, though out of belief that they are being under paid, rather than due to moral or practical objections. Unwilling agreements are ones the target would never agree to, but which don't go against the target's core principles, or involve serious danger. A forced agreement is one which is dangerous (though not suicidal), or forces the target to, say, betray a close friend.
8 hours Touch Special +15 Caster can speak/write a translation +30 Neither language nor script needs to be known
A spell which allows the caster to read documents written in a language or script unknown to her. With the basic spell, the caster must know either the language or the script. The spell creates a special relationship between the caster and a single page of the written work; and cannot be extended to include other texts or readers. The caster is perceiving the imprinted thoughts of the author, and this gets harder with the age of the document. She must make a perception roll of 15+ if the document is less than a month old, 20+ for up to a year, and at a further +5 for each tenfold increase in age of the work. If it was written by someone who didn't understand what they were writing, translation may be impossible. The caster cannot speak or write while performing the spell, so any translations will have to be from memory.
Near Will Concentration +15 Range short
An enchantment which stimulates an existing phobia, mania or any psyche complex in a victim. If successful, the victim's most acute psyche attribute is stimulated; a victim with arachniphobia, for example, will see spiders where none exist, or many spiders where only a few exist, and so on.
Touch Concentration +15 Range is near +30 Duration becomes momentary
A spell which causes writing to appear magically on a scroll or other written work held by the caster. The spell cannot work on enchanted objects. The words exist for as long as the caster concentrates.
Self None
This is a higher level version of Violet Eye, which allows single word answers to questions. Otherwise it is the same.
1 hour Touch Momentary
An enchantment which improves the condition of a written work, raising its quality by one. Pen and ink are required. Each casting can affect one page of a work.
Near Ego Sleep +15 Range short +60 Shift passion by 10 points
This spell creates or weakens an emotion in the target, changing it by as much as four points in either direction. No emotion can be taken beyond +/-5. The change lasts until the target next sleeps.
Near Temperence Sleep
Creates in the target a desire for some material object, which can be seen by the target when the spell is cast. The target develops an irrational desire to possess the item. The actions of the target are determined by their personality and morals, but an honest knight will probably not resort to theft or murder to obtain it, but they may make a fool of themselves trying to purchase or otherwise obtain the item.
Touch Will +15 Range near +30 Affects 2 senses +60 Affects all senses
An enchantment that permits the caster to experience the sensations of the target. The caster declares a specific sense (eyesight, hearing, olfactory or touch), and thereafter the caster experiences the target's sensations for that sense. As long as the spell is maintained, the distance between target and caster is irrelevant.
Reach Will Concentration +15 Range is near +30 Caster can erase knowledge of his presence +60 Caster may attempt to erase victim's memory in other regards
A spell to suppress the will of a victim touched by the caster, so that she will follow the caster's orders; it is normally used on animals or people.
Spirit Block creates a bond between caster and his victim. He can read surface thoughts and emotions, direct her actions and ask questions. The victim will not volunteer information, so questions must be very direct and specific. Because of the bond, any harm which befalls either the caster or the victim is experienced by the other. So if one is cut, so is the other. If one dies, so does the other. The victim is aware of the spell, and what was asked of her.
Touch Ego Momentary +20 Range is near +40 Everyone within near can be affected +80 Caster can choose who it affects, within near
This spell causes shock and confusion in the mind of the target. If the target fails to resist, then they cannot act for the rest of the round. From then on, they are at -25 penalty to physical actions, and at -50 to spell casting. At the end of each following round, they get a will roll at difficulty 30 to recover.
Self Near Will x Ego Concentration +20 The caster can move within the zone. +40 Caster can release targets by touching them. +80 The sphere can be moved, at a metre per round.
This spell creates confusion in the affected area. All creatures must make an ego roll or suffer the effects of the spell. Those affected will tend to act randomly, if at all. The zone is centred on the caster, and if she moves, the spell is broken. If new targets come within the zone, they must make a will roll to avoid being affected. Once a creature has resisted, they do not need to roll again, even if they leave and re-enter the zone.
Near Near Will x Ego Concentration +20 Gain three fatigue +40 Range is short +80 Gain four fatigue
All targets within the area of the spell are affected unless they make an ego roll to resist. On failure, and each round that they fail, they gain two long term fatigue levels.
The spell ends when they fall asleep, succeed in a roll to resist, or move out of the area.
Short Stamina x Ego Momentary +20 Range is medium. +40 Affects all within range. +80 Caster can choose who within range is affected.
The target of this spell suffers powerful mental shock if they fail their ego roll. The victim suffers seven stuns, automatically loosing their next attack and dropping anything held.
Short Perception Concentration +40 Spell may be placed on another target. +80 Affected person may interact with others.
This spell is laid upon the caster, causing him to be ignored by those within range who fail their resistance roll. As long as the caster keeps a low profile, he will be ignored. If he does something which attracts attention, observers get another roll. Note that those outside the range of the spell are unaffected, so can possibly act to warn those nearby. More powerful castings of this spell may allow the caster to interact with others, causing them to treat the caster as another guard for instance.
Reach Will Momentary +25 Range is near. +50 Caster can choose which body functions are disabled. +100 Duration is concentration, and caster can activate and deactivate body functions at will.
When cast on a target, Knife of Kasrith will sever the spirit and mind of the target. The target is not killed, but they no longer have conscious control over their body. Any automatic body functions will continue to function, such as breathing, and they can taste, see and hear normally. However, they cannot move, speak or cast spells.
Self Will Concentration +50 Caster can lay the spell on another.
This spell is cast upon the caster, and while it remains in effect, the caster can affect the mind of those he speaks to, forcing them to consider anything he says to be reasonable. When a conversation is first started with someone, then they get a will roll to resist. If the target's will is overcome, then guards will open doors for the caster, merchants will willingly hand over goods as gifts and so on. If suggestions are unreasonable (kill your lord, sign over all your property to my name), then further will checks, at a possible bonus, will be allowed.
Special Special
This spell (which is not, actually, a ward) is used to protect a secret from being discovered through magical means. It can not prevent discovery using mundane methods. The rank of the spell is modified by how many people know the secret. If the number of people who know changes after the spell is cast, then the rank of the spell is changed to reflect this.
Persons: 1 2+ 4+ 8+ 16+ 32+ 64+ 128+
Rank: +1 +0 -1 -2 -3 -4 -5 -
If 128 or more people know of the secret, then the spell is broken, and the caster is made aware of this fact. Likewise, if the effective rank of the ward drops to zero or less, then the spell is broken. The secret cannot be discovered by arcane means until the spell is removed, either with Survan's Key, or a Dispel at least two ranks higher. The latter must be cast on someone who knows the secret, and specifically against this spell.
Special Special +50 The caster can leave the Mikaad's Ward in place. They are free to divine the hidden knowledge however. This does increase the number of people who know the secret.
This spell allows the caster to remove Mikaad's Ward on a named secret. If Survan's Key is higher rank than Mikaad's Ward, then the Ward is broken, and the caster can then divine the secret. The caster of the original Mikaad's Ward will know that their spell has been broken.
Schmunk Touch Concentration Will +10 Range is reach +20 Range is near +40 Range is short
Measure's the level of consciousness of a target. One target may be sensed each round the spell is maintained. The Shek-Pvar knows whether the target is dead, sleeping or conscious, as well as whether the target is sentient or sapient. The relative will of the target is also known, either weaker than the Shek-Pvar, more powerful than, or roughly equal to (will is within one of the Shek-Pvar's).
Reilly & Schmunk Reach Momentary Will +15 Range is near +30 Range is short
Stimulate's an existing emotion in a victim. Whatever emotion is currently felt by the target is enhanced or reduced (choice of the caster). Someone who is angry may well become violent. Effectively their passion stat for the emotion is set to at least +4 for the duration. The effects end when the cause of the emotion ends.
Torben Mogensen Self Concentration Will +15 Range is touch +30 Infrasion is overlayed over normal vision
When this spell is cast, the caster becomes capable of perceiving heat. The sense replaces the caster's normal sight. Hot things are bright, cold things are dark. Living creatures can be seen reasonably easily, though may be hidden by cold clothing. Walls and doors can be seen unless the environment has had a very stable temperature, since they will tend to heat up at different rates.
Self Concentration +10 Ignore two levels of wounds +20 Ignore three levels of wounds +40 Range is touch
Allows the caster to ignore the penalties from one level of wounds and stuns while the spell is in effect. So, if the caster is at -10 from wounds and -3 from stuns, then his penalties become -6 and -1.
Reilly & Schmunk Reach Concentration Will
Causes a single target to believe that one object she can see when the spell is cast is valuable and desirable. She will feel compelled to purchase the item at a price greater than it is worth, and will not look too closely for flaws in the item. The target will pay two to five times the normal price of the item.
Near Concentration Will +15 Range is short +30 Range is medium +60 Range is far
The spell alerts the caster to the presence of any ghosts, spirits or ethereal creatures within range. If the target fails it's will roll, then the Shek-Pvar knows roughly where it is, otherwise she knows only it's general direction, plus the spirit knows a spell was targeted against it. Only those within line of sight can be detected, regardless of the range of the spell.
Reach Concentration Will +15 Range is near +30 Range is short +60 Range is medium
Allows caster to communicate with a perceived spirit, assuming a common language is known. If no common language is known, then some dialog is still possible, but it is more abstract.
Schmunk Near Momentary Stamina x Ego +30 Can affect all targets within range +60 Can choose which targets to affect
Causes mental and physical shock in the target, overloading their nervous system to cause pain and trauma. The target receives two stuns unless they resist the spell.
Torben Mogensen Reach Concentration Will +15 Range is near +30 Can affect up to three targets +60 Can affect all target's within range
Causes complete blindness in affected targets. Effect lasts while the caster concentrates.
Near Concentration Stamina x Ego +15 Range is short +30 Penalty is -15 +60 Penalty is -25
Affects the target's mind such that they believe themselves to be burning up from the inside. The pain causes three stuns initially, then one extra stun each round the spell is maintained. Further, each round of pain puts the target at an additional -10 penalty to all actions.
The spell ends if the target resists the spell, or moves out of range.
